title: The worst thing about the Champion Mastery System.
body:
I can't say to my team "gonna try out X, they seem cool" that I actually play well with and give them a nice surprise when I ~~do well ~~ shit stomp and apologize for lying because THAT FUCKING BANNER shows up during loading. I wonder how many realised that last game during loading and thought my fake noob talk was sad because it only occurred to me in the post match lobby XD. Stomped away...although that was Raka mid. Yeah. Ewwwwww. Don't think that outcome was ever in doubt tbh.

No more Lux free week fun eventually, those were the best. =(

replies.body: You realise the free to play week thing makes it much more believable right?
People make jokes too. You aren't the only one nor the first one to try joking in pre-game. My challenger mate and  I do it all the time..

i dont make judgements on that statement, ive heard it enough but ive also seen too many feeders for any reaction to be made. its overused and not funny to anyone but you when you carry. gj if you play well but its really just a dad joke at this point
